author: Simon Difford
description: The Cosmopolitan was originally made with citrus vodka but this recipe works just as well with unflavoured vodka, and when a good quality cranberry juice is used, we prefer the simplicity of unflavoured vodka in this cocktail.
name: Cosmopolitan Cocktail (Difford's recipe)

recipeInstructions.text: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass
